name: gpu-screen-recorder
desc: A shadowplay-like screen recorder for Linux. The fastest screen recorder for Linux
optdepends: libxnvctrl: Required when using the -oc option to overclock the NVIDIA GPU to workaround NVIDIA p2 state bug
nvidia-utils: Required to record your screen on NVIDIA
mesa: Required to record your screen on AMD/Intel
libva-mesa-driver: Required to record your screen on AMD
libva-intel-driver: Required to record your screen on Intel G45 and HD Graphics family
intel-media-driver: Required to record your screen on Intel Broadwell or later iGPUs or Intel Arc
linux-firmware-intel: Required to record your screen on Intel Skylake or later iGPUs
